IAM Policy for uploading docker image to ECR

{
"Version": "2012-10-17",
"Statement": [
{
"Sid": "VisualEditor0",
"Effect": "Allow",
"Action": [
"ecr:CreateRepository",
"ecr:CompleteLayerUpload",
"ecr:GetAuthorizationToken",
"ecr:UploadLayerPart",
"ecr:InitiateLayerUpload",
"ecr:BatchCheckLayerAvailability",
"ecr:PutImage"
],
"Resource": "*"
}
]
}
